The largest fall from grace any game has ever had.

I am very disappointed with this game. They have nerfed everything that made Overwatch 1 fun and exciting. The heroes, the maps, the modes, the balance, the graphics, everything is worse than before. This game feels like a downgrade, not an upgrade. I want my Overwatch 1 back. This game is not worth your time or money.

oh, overwatch? well, i think overwatch is a not-so-great game , teehee! it's not very fun , and there are lots of issues with bad game design and SUPPORT PLAYERS ARE GIGA SPOILED. The  heroes that are designed for women and lgbt are easier to play. So Much Skill ceiling yea. Would much rather watch Overwatch Porn

Don't
Overwatch 2 is everything that is wrong with the gaming industry
Firstly shutting down Overwatch 1 which people had do pay 60€ for and can no longer access(!)
Then creating Overwatch 2 as free to play with the greediest monetizing systems this truly greedy industry has to offer.
Do not support this developer with your money and do not support them with a second of your time.

希望暴雪领导层能多去看看自己父母的墓碑，不要当个日了狗的畜生。
I hope that Blizzard's leadership can visit their parents' tombstones more, and don't be a beast of a dog.
虽然是个好游戏，但是暴雪的操作让我感觉我的六年陪伴就是个笑话！必须给个红
垃圾游戏

守望先锋：归西，给暴雪一点3%的小小震撼

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评
评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

来点客观评价
暴雪、考迪克死一死的话估计无数人在刷了，总要谈点客观的，不然会有些自觉中立的人说点未经他人苦，却劝他人善的风凉话

先说公事：
停更几年，画了N年大饼的守望先锋2就是这玩意？改动还没个版本更新大，这些年员工都在忙什么？办公室性骚扰？看看当年守望2预告CG动画里老玩家的弹幕，现今看来只有2个字：心寒。逼肝骗氪就不说了，反正暴雪现在也就只会这个，我的战役模式呢？信誓旦旦的PVE一拖再拖，张口就是为了玩家更好的体验这些晦涩难懂的词。

再聊私事：
账号承载着老玩家的青春回忆，见证了和朋友一起欢笑犯糗的时光。你说没就没，这就是您说的为了玩家？向钱看嘛，不寒掺，哪怕您站直了脊梁骨，说几句真话，我对您的鄙夷也能少那么几分，来洗的暴白也会多一点。中国玩家不重要，但中国玩家的真金白银很重要。


新玩家的避坑理由
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。

结语：
再不刷差评，我可要给三国杀打好评了哦
今天我们相聚在一起，是为了庆祝一位杰出的游戏在新平台登录时出殡风光大葬！祝守望先锋PVE剧情平淡可重复游玩性差，祝守望先锋登录新平台差评如潮！

I found the "new player experience" to be incredibly frustrating and demeaning, I was getting yelled at for not playing certain characters, but I don't have them unlocked? Blizzard/Activision have tried to turn this into a cash cow. I seriously cannot believe the prices of skins in this game, they are the price of AAA games that have been out for 1-2 years on sale, why the fuck would I want to pay for a skin when I can buy a LITERAL game for the same price? Fuck you Blizzard/Activision you are absolute scum. You killed this game.

《守望先锋：归来》，是由暴雪娱乐发行的游戏，前身为《守望先锋》。
2022年10月5日，《守望先锋：归来》公测 ；11月17日，暴雪游戏运营团队发布公告，《守望先锋：归来》等暴雪游戏产品将于2023年1月24日0时在中国大陆地区停止运营 。
2023年7月20日，暴雪宣布旗下游戏将陆续登陆Steam平台，包含《守望先锋 ：归来》，游戏于8月11日上线Steam，支持简体中文。 [spoiler]暴雪你马死了，烤迪克祭献亲妈意图复活暴雪的马，可惜失败双双陨落[/spoiler]

非常失望。跟屎一样，暴雪纯恶心人

Don't listen to all the trolls, yes could the monetization be better? I think we can agree that overall the entire industry could use better monetization practices. But in the end this is still the best shooter out there for people who don't want the slow tactical feel of games like Val/CSGO. I think what they just released is their best content drop and the new hero is stupid fun, it's a free game so you aren't losing much more than time by playing it. I've put over 2k hours into this franchise and I don't feel ripped off with the PVE changes or other things left out. I don't play this game for the PVE, it's a PVP game only for me and that's all I care about so take that how you will. No game touches their skins, cinematics and lore best Hero Shooter around period

Даже если ты покупал первую часть в Battle.net, с тебя будут трясти деньги как со всех. За что? За diversity и inclusivity. Никогда не запомню новое имя Маккри.

Прежде чем соглашаться с Blizzard, донатить реальные деньги за скинчики/БП/задания подумай, в первой части по большей части те же самые скинчики и анимашки люди получали просто во время активной игры, сезонные задания просто были. А теперь каждый элемент по цене отдельной игры в условно бесплатной донатной помойке теряющей своих постоянных игроков.

California Files a Lawsuit Against Activision Blizzard

On July 20, 2021, the California Department of Fair Employment and Housing filed a lawsuit against Activision Blizzard after a lengthy two-year investigation. According to Bloomberg Law, the agency accused the company of promoting a “‘frat boy’ culture” that put female employees in the crosshairs. While women only made up approximately 20% of Activision Blizzard’s employee population, they experienced “constant sexual harassment, unequal pay, and retaliation.” 

One of the biggest discoveries was the pervasiveness of what the lawsuit dubbed “cube crawls,” where male employees got drunk, crawled their way through cubicles, and participated in “inappropriate behavior toward female employees.” Many male employees also allegedly openly joked about rape and passed off their responsibilities to their female coworkers just so they could slack off and play video games. Moreover, female employees claimed they were passed over for promotions because “they might become pregnant.” However, arguably the most troubling accusation listed in the lawsuit is the reveal that one unnamed female Activision worker committed suicide while on a company trip with an unnamed “male supervisor.” She was allegedly the victim of “intense sexual harassment” to the point where nude pictures of her were circulated during a company holiday party.

Former Blizzard President J. Allen Brack Addresses the Harassment Allegations Before Leaving the Company

Shortly after the sexual harassment allegations came to light, many prominent figures in the gaming industry expressed how much the news distressed them. One such person was then-Blizzard President J. Allen Brack. He claimed to know nothing about the harassment and wanted to help ensure the wellbeing and safety of Blizzard’s employees, which is all well and good save for one crucial detail: He was mentioned by name as having prior knowledge of the harassment and reportedly did nothing about it, all while acting “too friendly” to female employees. The other prominent Blizzard figure directly named in the lawsuit is Alex Afrasiabi. He reportedly told women he wanted to marry them and tried to kiss them, among other actions, and his supervisors had to “pull him off” his victims multiple times. 

While Brack and Afrasiabi left Activision Blizzard (or, in Afrasiabi’s case, was fired) due to their connection with the lawsuit, they weren’t alone. Diablo 4’s Lead Designer Jesse McCree, World of Warcraft designer Jonathan LeCraft, and Lead Game Designer Cory Stockton were all fired after their part in the company’s sexual harassment scandal came to light.

Frances Townsend (or Bobby Kotick?) Sends a Troubling Internal Email

Controversial Activision Blizzard Vice President Frances Townsend (who formerly worked for the Bush administration) disturbed many people in and outside of the company when she reportedly sent an email that called the allegations outlined in the investigation a “distorted and untrue picture of our company” and generally attempted to downplay the validity and severity of the situation.

Later, the Wall Street Journal reported that the email was actually written by Activision CEO Bobby Kotick. Author aside, the tone-deaf nature of the email caused many Blizzard employees to immediately respond in their own way…

Activision Blizzard Employees Stage A Walkout

As news of the lawsuit and its allegations spread through Activision Blizzard’s workforce, many employees staged a walkout in response. Tempers didn’t calm down afterward. If anything, emotions rose after reports hit that many higher-ups knew about the accusations and did nothing about them. Over 100 employees walked out in protest and shared a clear demand: Fire CEO Bobby Kotick. Moreover, well over 2,000 employees signed a letter that called the company out on their response. 
According to the organization behind many of the employee protests, ABK Workers Alliance, many of the employees’ demands have not been met. That was true back in August of 2021, and it is still true today. Moreover, the Communication Workers of America labor union called Activision Blizzard’s $18 million settlement deal over sexual harassment allegations, “a slap in the face” since the company is worth $72 billion.

Fans and News Outlets Refuse to Play and Cover Activision Blizzard Games

Shortly after the sexual harassment lawsuit came to light, a huge portion of the Blizzard fanbase boycotted the company and its games. Many gamers and streamers, including those who were known for playing titles like World of Warcraft and Hearthstone, refused to touch the games. They weren’t alone, as sites such as The Gamer, Prima Games, and GameXplain elected to cease all coverage of Activision Blizzard titles. No good news, no bad news, just deafening silence until, as The Gamer Editor in Chief Kirk McKeand put it, “there’s some real change.”

Allegations Against Activision Blizzard CEO Bobby Kotick Are Made Public

Recently, many allegations regarding Activision Blizzard’s CEO, Bobby Kotick, have come to light. For instance, according to the Wall Street Journal, he once sent an intimidating voicemail to one of his assistants, threatening to kill her. And yes, he also allegedly knew about the sexual harassment in his company and did nothing about it. Well, that’s not entirely true — he apparently protected the perpetrators and refused to report the incidents to the company’s board of directors. This led to another lawsuit filed by investors angry over Kotick’s “issuing materially false and misleading statements during a class action period.”

[h1] 守望日记 [/h1]

晚上总是睡不着。凡事须得研究，才会明白。

他们——也有当暴白过的，也有网易无脑充钱撑腰的，也有勤勤恳恳出涩图的，也有网恋被骗八千的；他们那时候的脸色，全没有昨天这么怕，也没有这么凶。

最奇怪的是昨天国王大道的那个布里吉塔，要打铁拳，嘴里说道，[b] “老娘呀！我要抡你几锤子才出气！ [/b]”她眼睛却看着我安娜。我出了一惊，遮掩不住；那青面獠牙的一伙人，便都哄笑起来。生命之梭赶上前，硬把我拖回家中了。

拖我回家，家里的人都装作不认识我；他们的脸色，也全同别人一样。进了家门，便被反了阿贡，宛然是进了一狱。这一件事，越教我猜不出底细。

前几天，花村的源氏来告荒，对我大哥半藏说，他们村里的一个大猩猩，给大家打死了；几个人便挖出他的心肝来，用油煎炒了吃，可以壮壮胆子。我插了一句嘴，源氏和大哥便都看我几眼。今天才晓得他们的眼光，全同外面的那伙人一模一样。
想起来，我从顶上直冷到脚跟。

他们会吃人，就未必不会吃我安娜。

你看那布里吉塔“抡你几锤子”的话，和一伙青面獠牙人的笑，和前天源氏的话，明明是暗号。我看出他话中全是毒，笑中全是刀。他们的牙齿，全是白厉厉的排着，这就是吃人的家伙。

照我自己想，虽然不是恶人，自从被暴雪[b] 踢出了族谱簿子[/b]，可就难说了。他们似乎别有心思，我全猜不出。况且他们一翻脸，便说人是恶人。我还记得大哥教我做论，无论怎样好人，翻他几句，他便打上几个圈；原谅坏人几句，他便说“翻天妙手，与众不同”。我那里猜得到他们的心思，究竟怎样；况且是要吃的时候。

凡事总须研究，才会明白。古来时常吃人，我也还记得，可是不甚清楚。

我翻开历史一查，这历史没有年代，歪歪斜斜的每页上都写着[b] 玩家至上 [/b]几个字。

我横竖睡不着，仔细看了半夜，才从字缝里看出字来，满本都写着两个字是[b] 吃人 [/b]！

书上写着这许多字，烤迪克说了这许多话，却都笑吟吟的睁着怪眼看我。

[b] 我也是人，他们想要吃我了！[/b]

但是理智告诉我：人不犯我，我不犯人；人若犯我，我必犯人！

A great game ruined by bad decisions and greed.
As a Overwatch player back when it started, the game had an active development and a team that cared enough about it and made podcasts about their thoughts and future developments, which made the players a lot more invested in this game and every character's story. A few years past and that team disappears, development slows down so much that old content is reused, new heroes release kept being shifted, etc.
Then Overwatch 2 is promised and hyped, as a new chapter and the focus is PvE. As I don't care about PvE (I pretty much prefer the PvP aspect), I did not mind this, and kept playing the original version. Little did I know that Blizzard would not give an option, and everyone was forced to move to OW2 (despite being free, they had several tiers for sale before launch). What is everyone's shock to know OW2 is just the same game, with LESS features and... no PvE! The one aspect they hyped and sold as the main point for months. Oh, and did I mention a Battle Pass? So every few weeks you are expected to drop $$ to be able to get new skins, etc. It is just skins right, why does it matter? Because in the old system you could be rewarded those skins through lootboxes when you progressed. Now? You are progressing for a some cheap cosmetics.
Granted that not everything is worse, the fundamental is still there and that is why I play, but Blizzard does not deserve one cent if they don't do a 180.

Ce jeu n'est plus ce qu'il était. Overwatch ne représente que déception sur déception. Il n'y a plus rien à sauver là-dedans, et tout ce qu'il reste aujourd'hui sont un semblant de "PVE" intégré dans un Battle Pass sans intérêt, de nouveaux personnages dont il faut payer pour en avoir totalement l'accès directement, des microtransactions avec des skins hors de prix.
Dobra gra, hejterzy i tak będą hejtować :D

虽然但是，什么时候数据回来了、6V6回来了、UI改回来了（计分板还行）、等级和箱子改回来了；
暴雪我才会用天使把你老母拉起来，但是很明显这不现实，所以总结就是：
